about.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. Specialized in modern technologies and scalable solutions that drive business growth.
about.biography_text1: With more than 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating digital solutions that not only work perfectly, but also offer memorable experiences to users.
about.biography_text2: My approach focuses on the intersection between technology and design, where functionality meets aesthetics. I firmly believe that the best code is one that solves real problems in an elegant and efficient way.
about.biography_text3: When I'm not programming, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of work that reflects my passion for creating innovative digital solutions and exceptional experiences
projects.collaborate: I'd love to collaborate with you to bring your ideas to life. Let's work together to create something extraordinary.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to learn more about your idea and how we can work together to make it a reality.
contact.thanks_response: Thank you for contacting me. I'll respond within the next 24 hours.
contact.message_placeholder: Tell me about your project, goals, timeline and any important details...
contact.response_time: Currently accepting new projects. Response time: 24-48 hours.
contact.work_together: Let's work together to create something extraordinary. Your vision, my experience, exceptional results.

faqs.delivery_answer: It depends on the project, but generally between 2-8 weeks for complete web projects.
faqs.maintenance_answer: Yes, we offer monthly maintenance plans with technical support and updates.
faqs.budget: Do you work with specific budgets?
faqs.budget_answer: Absolutely. We adapt our services to your budget and priorities.
faqs.technologies_answer: React, Node.js, Python, TypeScript, and the latest market technologies.
